mapper.select: SELECT /* com.ceragem.batch.crm.dao.CrmEventBatchDao.selectExpirePointList */ A.ITG_CUST_NO , A.CUST_NM /*고객명 */ , A.GNDR_CD /*성별코드 */ , A.BIRTHDAY /*생년월일 */ , B.EXP_POINT_SCORE , A.REMAIN_POINT_SCORE , DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',A.MPHON_NO,'') MPHON_NO /*이동전화번호암호화값 MPHON_NO */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{ymd},'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') EXP_DT FROM CRM_CUST_BAS A INNER JOIN (SELECT A.ITG_CUST_NO , SUM(A.OCCUR_POINT_SCORE) OCCUR_POINT_SCORE , NVL(SUM(B.USE_POINT_SCORE),0) USE_POINT_SCORE , SUM(A.OCCUR_POINT_SCORE) - NVL(SUM(B.USE_POINT_SCORE),0) EXP_POINT_SCORE FROM CRM_POINT_HST A LEFT JOIN CRM_POINT_USE_REL B ON A.POINT_HST_SEQ = B.OCCUR_POINT_HST_SEQ WHERE A.OCCUR_POINT_SCORE > 0 AND A.VALID_PERD_END_YMD = #{ymd} AND A.USE_TYPE_CD = '002' AND A.EXTNC_DT IS NULL GROUP BY A.ITG_CUST_NO HAVING SUM(A.OCCUR_POINT_SCORE) - NVL(SUM(B.USE_POINT_SCORE),0) > 0 ) B ON A.ITG_CUST_NO = B.ITG_CUST_NO WHERE A.MSHIP_SBSC_YN = 'Y' AND A.CUST_STATUS_CD != '003'

SELECT /* com.ceragem.batch.crm.dao.CrmEventBatchDao.selectExpireTalkList */ A.ITG_CUST_NO , A.CUST_NM /*고객명 */ , A.GNDR_CD /*성별코드 */ , A.BIRTHDAY /*생년월일 */ , B.EXP_POINT_SCORE , A.REMAIN_POINT_SCORE , DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',A.MPHON_NO,'') MPHON_NO /*이동전화번호암호화값 MPHON_NO */ , TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS( SYSDATE , 1),'YYYY-MM') EXP_DT FROM CRM_CUST_BAS A INNER JOIN (SELECT A.ITG_CUST_NO , SUM(A.OCCUR_POINT_SCORE) OCCUR_POINT_SCORE , NVL(SUM(B.USE_POINT_SCORE),0) USE_POINT_SCORE , SUM(A.OCCUR_POINT_SCORE) - NVL(SUM(B.USE_POINT_SCORE),0) EXP_POINT_SCORE FROM CRM_POINT_HST A LEFT JOIN CRM_POINT_USE_REL B ON A.POINT_HST_SEQ = B.OCCUR_POINT_HST_SEQ WHERE A.OCCUR_POINT_SCORE > 0 AND A.VALID_PERD_END_YMD LIKE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS( SYSDATE , 1),'YYYYMM') || '%' AND A.USE_TYPE_CD = '002' AND A.EXTNC_DT IS NULL GROUP BY A.ITG_CUST_NO HAVING SUM(A.OCCUR_POINT_SCORE) - NVL(SUM(B.USE_POINT_SCORE),0) > 0 ) B ON A.ITG_CUST_NO = B.ITG_CUST_NO WHERE A.MSHIP_SBSC_YN = 'Y' AND A.CUST_STATUS_CD != '003'
mapper.update: UPDATE /* com.ceragem.batch.crm.dao.CrmEventBatchDao.updateExpirePoint*/CRM_POINT_HST SET EXTNC_DT = SYSDATE WHERE EXTNC_DT IS NULL AND OCCUR_POINT_SCORE > 0 AND USE_TYPE_CD = '002' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') > VALID_PERD_END_YMD
